attributes.class: =if([$Status] == 'Done', 'ms-bgColor-greenLight', if([$Status] == 'Working on it', 'ms-bgColor-blueLight', if([$Status] == 'Thinking about it', 'ms-bgColor-neutralLight', if([$Status] == 'Nevermind', 'ms-bgColor-yellow', 'ms-bgColor-orangeLight')))) + ' ms-fontColor-neutralPrimary'

attributes.iconName: =if([$Status] == 'Done', 'CompletedSolid', if([$Status] == 'Working on it', 'PinnedSolid', if([$Status] == 'Thinking about it', 'TestBeakerSolid', if([$Status] == 'Nevermind', 'WarningSolid', 'Blocked2Solid'))))
attributes.title: [$Status]
